Description: Wall fragment of Fikellura pottery amphora. Medium-fine, light brown (7.5 YR 6/4) clay. Dark brown glaze. Exterior: three leaves preserved of a rosette; part of a volute to right. Interior reserved.
Curator's comments: Object owned and held by Akademisches Kunstmuseum. This record is included in the British Museum database as part of the Museum’s Naukratis Project, a research collaboration that aims to virtually re-unite finds from the ancient port city of Naukratis, now distributed over 80 museums worldwide.
Bibliographic references: Piekarski 2001 / Die Keramik aus Naukratis im Akademischen Kunstmuseum Bonn (p.29 no. A28 pl. 7.4)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GF.047)
